# Collapse

Toggle the visibility of any element within your application.

# Example

<p-button v-collapse:example-1>Toggle</p-button>

<p-collapse name="example-1">
    <p-card class="mt-3">
        <span class="text-xl font-bold">Boo!</span>
    </p-card>
</p-collapse>
Help us improve this page!
